0.text: Innate: Heimerdinger gains  20% bonus movement speed while near an allied  turret or a  H-28G Evolution Turret or  H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.
0.html: Innate: Heimerdinger gains  20% bonus movement speed while near an allied turret or a H-28G Evolution Turret or H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location, which lasts until destroyed.

1.text: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit charge, up to a maximum of 3.
1.html: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit charge, up to a maximum of 3.

2.text: Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, and deploying a fourth destroys the oldest one.
2.html: Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, and deploying a fourth destroys the oldest one.

3.text: See Pets for more details about H-28G Evolution Turrets.
3.html: See Pets for more details about H-28G Evolution Turrets.

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.

1.text: H-28Q Apex Turret scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
1.html: H-28Q Apex Turret scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.

2.text: See Pets for more details about the H-28Q Apex Turret.
2.html: See Pets for more details about the H-28Q Apex Turret.

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each rocket dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy  champion grants 20% beam charge to all   turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each rocket dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy champion grants 20% beam charge to all turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.

1.text: Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing reduced damage, and  minions taking increased additional damage.
1.html: Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing reduced damage, and minions taking increased additional damage.

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of rockets in quick succession to the target location, each rocket dealing magic damage. Enemy  champions and  monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth.  Minions take increased damage.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of rockets in quick succession to the target location, each rocket dealing magic damage. Enemy champions and monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth. Minions take increased damage.

1.text: Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
1.html: Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location, detonating upon impact to deal magic damage to enemies within the area and  slow them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy  champion, all   turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
0.html: Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location, detonating upon impact to deal magic damage to enemies within the area and slow them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy champion, all turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.

1.text: Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Enemies hit at the center of the grenade's impact are also stunned for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.
0.html: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.

1.text: Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be  slowed and  stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.
1.html: Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be slowed and stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.

2.text: CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
2.html: CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with UPGRADE!!!'s rank.

3.text: CH-3X Lightning Grenade will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: CH-3X Lightning Grenade will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic ability for an additional effect. These empowered abilities have the same  cooldowns as their basic forms, deal modified damage, and do not have a  mana cost. UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds, and does so automatically upon casting another ability.
0.html:
Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic ability for an additional effect. These empowered abilities have the same  cooldowns as their basic forms, deal modified damage, and do not have a  mana cost.

UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds, and does so automatically upon casting another ability.

1.text: Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second  cooldown.
1.html: Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second  cooldown.

2.text: UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
2.html: UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

1.originHTML: +  +  1000

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
